Description: Bowl of dolomite limestone: with a flat base and convex sides, which turn inwards to a contracted mouth, around which there is a rounded external rim. Beneath the rim there is a narrow groove.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Brunton, 'British Museum expedition to Middle Egypt, 1929-1931 Matmar' (London, 1948), 25, and pl. XXIII, 15.
